General.Name: GOME Retail Holdings Limited
General.Description: GOME Retail Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail and online retail of electrical appliances, consumer electronic products, and general merchandise in the People's Republic of China. The company also sells its products online through self-operated and platform models. In addition, it is involved in the provision of logistics and procurement, storage and delivery, IT development, and business management services; retail of mobile phones and accessories; and property holding activities. The company was formerly known as GOME Electrical Appliances Holding Limited and changed its name to GOME Retail Holdings Limited in 2017. GOME Retail Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Two International Finance Centre, Central, Hong Kong

5.Name: Ms. Wei  Ding
